thread.title: Graham Wylde

author: Graham Wylde
title: Graham Wylde
text: A friend recommended this service and this was the first time I had used it. I was in no rush to get the tyres changed and so opted for the lowest cost which was installation in 4 days time. I was contacted straight away and on the morning. The mechanic who came arrived when he said he would. He was very friendly and seems to have done a perfect job. I would certainly use this service again. Excellent in all respects.
